page.title: 09Great Horwood Ghosts
page.content: Like most villages, Great Horwood has its share of {Ghost Stories}. {Nansley's Brake} One day a woman went for a walk with her dog through Nansley's Brake, not noticing a well ahead of her, she tripped and fell in. Her dog's head caught on an overhanging branch which decapitated him. On misty nights her ghost walks through the brake with her headless dog. {The Ghost called Mary} One villager told us about a ghost they call Mary. She is a happy ghost, she likes Christmas and hates changes. The villager has seen the ghost, she wears yellow clothing and is quite young. Once when the villager was baking a cake, she got out a cake tin, turned round and the tin disappeared never to be seen again.
